title: & II structures where plinth/façade of building is required to be retained, requirement of additional parking spaces as per this Regulation, over and above the existing parking shall not be insisted
clause_text: & II structures where plinth/façade of building is required to be retained, requirement of additional parking spaces as per this Regulation, over and above the existing parking shall not be insisted.
